version_description:
Thanks for using NFC Reader for iPhone!

In this update I added more error handling. The app should tell you now when a NFC tag is not supported. I also made some small visual changes in the user interface.

If you are encountering problems with the app please reach out to me. You can get my contact details through the App Store App-Support link.

Thanks for using NFC Reader for iPhone!

In this update I added a cool 3D flyover to the map view when you scan a tag with a location on it.

The future plan for the app is to add localisation for more languages. If you want the app in your language and you want to help me please reach out to me through the App Store App-Support link. I'd appreciate it!

If you are encountering problems with the app please reach out to me. You can get my contact details through the App Store App-Support link.

• UI improvements
• Bugfixes
• Updates for GDPR

Thanks for using NFC Reader for iPhone! This update includes following improvements and bugfixes:
• New: Background NFC scanning for iPhone XS and iPhone XR. Just hold the NFC Tag on your iPhone while it is unlocked. Only mailto, sms, tel, http and https can be detected due to restrictions in the system. This feature is sadly not working with iPhone X or below.
• Fixed: Business cards (vcard) with special characters are now parsed correctly
• Fixed several visual problems

In this update I added the following improvements:

Also I want to thank you for the great feedback, keep them coming!

NFC for iPhone now in version 3.0!

The new features:
• Expert mode: In this mode you can read the memory of an NFC tag
• Wi-Fi: Store Wi-Fi access data on an NFC tag and share access with your guests
• Widget: iOS 14 Widget that gives you quick access to the read function
• A lot has changed under the hood. I have stepped into the shallows of the NFC standard to make NFC for iPhone even better.

• This version fixes a crash that came with version 3.0
• Fixed missing translation in the widget
